title: Atilla Gaming is looking for competitive Gamers for our organization
body:
Write Your ThoughtsHi there!

I am the OCE regional manager of Atilla Gaming.
https://www.facebook.com/atillagaming
http://www.atillagaming.com

We are currently hiring for OCE.
You can read the rules and expectations on our website but here is a copy of it for lazy people.

Atilla Gaming looks for players:

    Aged 18 and over,
    Are at least Diamond 1 in LoL (or where D1 last season),
    Are able to attend local LAN tournaments,
    Are able to attend online tournaments,
    Are able to attend national tournaments, (Notice will be given)
    Are able to attend world tournaments, (Expenses will be paid)
    Have a passion for gaming,
    Would be comfortable living in a gaming house if needed, (Notice will be given)

I will be here for OCE specific discussion and on Reddit for any general questions! (http://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/2z345j/atilla_gaming_is_looking_for_competitive_gamers/)

Hoping to see some eager OCE players, looking forward to having you in our family.

 Atilla Gaming Team

Shouldn't you be out playing in the park with your little friends?
